smooth.metal
Class SmoothIconFactory

    java.lang.Object
    javax.swing.plaf.metal.MetalIconFactory
    smooth.metal.SmoothIconFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable 
public class SmoothIconFactory
extends MetalIconFactory

Smooth Icon Factory. These are a bit more difficult to handle, because you can't subclass the factory methods in the MetalIconFactory. Some genius thought they should be made private. Clever thinking dude! This means we're duplicating some code here, which isn't that bad since we want to draw stuff differently anyway.

See Also:
